snippet: The new data undercuts Republican arguments that the recovery is faltering and suggests that workers are seeing benefits from the drop in unemployment....
abstract: Labor Dept reports increase in hiring and salaries, signal that economy is strengthening, not ebbing as Republicans have suggested; upswing in jobs coincides with sharp drop in unemployment among least-educated workers, group that has missed out on nearly all gains of current recovery thus far.
lead_paragraph: The new data undercuts Republican arguments that the recovery is faltering and suggests that workers are seeing benefits from the drop in unemployment.

headline.main: Strong Job Gains, for Second Month, Reframe Economic Outlook
headline.print_headline: Big Job Gains for Second Month Shape Debate Over the Economy
